info.name: Behaviour Analyzer
info.summary: Anonymously analysis your sync and file patterns and logs them to you nextcloud instance.
info.description: Anonymously analysis your sync and file patterns and logs them to you nextcloud instance. These logs are used to build a machine learning based ransomware recovery if you provide your logs per e-mail to the developers of the ransomware recovery app.
info.author: Matthias Held
